Interface FileNameRule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileNameRuleCurrentTime, FileNameRuleImageUrl

    public interface FileNameRule
extends Serializable
    File name rule, used when saving images in ImageSDCardCache
    Author:
    Trinea 2012-7-6

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getFileName(String imageUrl)
      get file name, include suffix, it's optional to include folder.
